623490.name: Riley Short: Analog Boy - Episode 1 Soundtrack
623490.description:
Official Soundtrack of Riley Short: Analog Boy - Episode 1
Composer: Alexander Burke

Includes exclusive OST booklet with awesome art by Andy Kluthe!

Track listing:
1. Riley Short Theme Song - (vocals: Mela Lee)
2. The Boy Who Broke My Microwave (Riley Short End Credits Song) - (vocals: Mela Lee)
3. Riley Short Piano Theme (Instrumental)
4. Riley Short Promo Trailer Song - (vocals: Paul Rugg)
5. Electric Metal (Instrumental)
6. The Boy Who Broke My Microwave (Instrumental)
623490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
